root.select: SELECT name , database_id , create_date FROM sys.databases

SELECT Code , Unit , Br1 , Br11 , Br12 , Br13 , Br14 , Br15 , Br2 , Br21 , Br22 , Br23 , Br24 , Br25 , Br3 , Br31 , Br32 , Br33 , Br34 , Br35 , Br4 , Br41 , Br42 , Br43 , Br44 , Br45 , Br5 , Br51 , Br52 , Br53 , Br54 , Br55 , Br6 , Br61 , Br62 , Br63 , Br64 , Br65 , Br7 , Br71 , Br72 , Br73 , Br74 , Br75 , Jk1 , Jk2 , Jk3 , Jk4 , Jk5 , price11 , price12 , price13 , price14 , price15 , price21 , price22 , price23 , price24 , price25 , price31 , price32 , price33 , price34 , price35 , price41 , price42 , price43 , price44 , price45 , price51 , price52 , price53 , price54 , price55 FROM NixPen.dbo.Medi

SELECT A.Code , A.Nm , SUBSTRING(A.Id, 1, 6) AS Jumin1 , SUBSTRING(A.Id, 7, 13) AS Jumin2 , CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(A.Id, 7, 1) % 2 = 0 THEN 'F' ELSE 'M' END AS Gender , CASE SUBSTRING(A.Id, 7, 1) WHEN 1 THEN '19' WHEN 2 THEN '19' WHEN 3 THEN '20' WHEN 4 THEN '20' END + SUBSTRING(A.Id, 1, 6) AS BirthDay , A.Post , A.Addr1 , A.Addr2 , A.Hpp , A.Tel , CASE WHEN A.Susin = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS Susin , A.EMail , CASE WHEN LEN(A.Ymd) = 8 THEN CONVERT(datetime, A.Ymd , 120) ELSE GETDATE() END AS Ymd , A.JhId5 , ISNULL(B.Agree, '0') AS Agree , A.antenatal , A.Mm , A.Jk1 , A.Jk2 , A.Jk3 , A.Jk4 , A.Jk5 FROM NixPen.DBO.Person A LEFT JOIN NIXPENBASE.dbo.Person_SignList B ON A.Code = B.Chtno WHERE LEN(a.Id) = 13

SELECT A.* , CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), CAST(A.Ymd AS DATETIME), 120) AS JubsuTime , CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), B.JinStartTime, 120) AS JinStartTime , CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), B.JinEndTime, 120) AS JinEndTime , CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), B.SunapTime, 120) AS SunapTime , ISNULL(C.license, '') AS license FROM NIXPEN$YYYY$.dbo.List$YYYY$ A JOIN NIXPEN$YYYY$.dbo.TimeLog$YYYY$ B ON A.Code = B.Code AND A.Ymd = B.Ymd LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ymd, code, license FROM ( SELECT ymd, code, license FROM NIXPEN$YYYY$.dbo.Ch_DisDay$YY$01 UNION ALL SELECT ymd, code, license FROM NIXPEN$YYYY$.dbo.Ch_DisDay$YY$02 UNION ALL SELECT ymd, code, license FROM NIXPEN$YYYY$.dbo.Ch_DisDay$YY$03 UNION ALL SELECT ymd, code, license FROM NIXPEN$YYYY$.dbo.Ch_DisDay$YY$04 UNION ALL SELECT ymd, code, license FROM NIXPEN$YYYY$.dbo.Ch_DisDay$YY$05 UNION ALL SELECT ymd, code, license FROM NIXPEN$YYYY$.dbo.Ch_DisDay$YY$06 UNION ALL SELECT ymd, code, license FROM NIXPEN$YYYY$.dbo.Ch_DisDay$YY$07 UNION ALL SELECT ymd, code, license FROM NIXPEN$YYYY$.dbo.Ch_DisDay$YY$08 UNION ALL SELECT ymd, code, license FROM NIXPEN$YYYY$.dbo.Ch_DisDay$YY$09 UNION ALL SELECT ymd, code, license FROM NIXPEN$YYYY$.dbo.Ch_DisDay$YY$10 UNION ALL SELECT ymd, code, license FROM NIXPEN$YYYY$.dbo.Ch_DisDay$YY$11 UNION ALL SELECT ymd, code, license FROM NIXPEN$YYYY$.dbo.Ch_DisDay$YY$12
)A GROUP BY ymd, code, license ) C ON A.Ymd = C.Ymd AND A.Code = C.Code ORDER BY A.ymd, A.Tme
SELECT ChtNo , Ymd , Tx FROM NIXPEN.dbo.Symptom WHERE YMD LIKE '$YYYY$%' ORDER BY Ymd
SELECT * FROM NIXPEN$YYYY$.dbo.Ch_DisDay$YYMM$ ORDER BY Ymd

SELECT A.* , ISNULL(M.TJCode, '') AS TJCode , ISNULL(M.Memo, '') AS Memo FROM NIXPEN$YYYY$.dbo.Ch_Slip$YYMM$ A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ChtNo, Ymd, A.TJCode, STUFF(( SELECT ',' + Memo FROM NIXPEN$YYYY$.dbo.Ch_SlipMemo$YYYY$ WHERE ChtNo = A.ChtNo AND Ymd = A.Ymd FOR XML PATH(''), type ).value('.', 'nvarchar(max)') , 1, 2, '') As Memo FROM NIXPEN$YYYY$.dbo.Ch_SlipMemo$YYYY$ A GROUP BY ChtNo, Ymd, TJCode ) M ON A.Code = M.ChtNo AND A.Ymd = M.Ymd ORDER BY A.[Key]
